attributes.action: Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It wastes 10 days of so many people unnecessarily and just makes zero sense.
attributes.background: It just does not make any sense that someone who has taken the vaccine should have to isolate upon arrival in the UK.
